mapper.insert: insert into tempcat_free (freenum, id, title, contents, nickname) values (tempcat_free_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{nickname})
mapper.select:
select freenum, id, title, contents, to_char(inputdate, 'YY/MM/DD') inputdate, hits, originalfile, savedfile, nickname from tempcat_free
where title like '%' || #{_parameter} || '%'
order by freenum desc
mapper.update: update tempcat_free set hits = hits+1 where freenum = #{freenum}
mapper.insert: insert into free_reply (num, id, nickname, freenum, contents) values (free_reply_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{nickname}, #{freenum}, #{contents} )
mapper.select: select * from free_reply where freenum like #{freenum} order by num asc
mapper.update: update free_reply set contents = #{contents}, inputdate = default where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select * from tempcat_free where rownum < 4 order by freenum desc
select num from free_reply where num in (select max(num) maxnum from free_reply where id = #{id})
